description.zh: Portainer Community Edition 是一个轻量级的开源平台，用于简化对容器化环境（包括 Docker、Swarm、Kubernetes 和 Azure Container Instances）的管理。它通过直观的 Web 界面和丰富的 API 来管理容器、镜像、存储卷、网络等编排资源。该解决方案以单个容器形式运行，可在多种基础设施中轻松部署。
description.en: Portainer Community Edition is a lightweight, open-source platform designed to simplify the management of containerized environments, including Docker, Swarm, Kubernetes, and Azure Container Instances (ACI). It provides a user-friendly web interface and API to manage containers, images, volumes, networks, and other orchestration resources. The solution runs as a single container and is easy to deploy across diverse infrastructures.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 通过直观的图形界面简化复杂的容器编排操作
- 轻量级设计，部署简单，资源占用低
- 统一管理多种容器平台（Docker、Kubernetes、ACI）

## 功能列表:

- 通过 Web 界面管理容器、镜像、存储卷、网络和服务
- 支持 Docker、Docker Swarm、Kubernetes 和 Azure Container Instances (ACI)
- 可作为单个容器在 Linux 或 Windows 上运行
- 提供 RESTful API 用于自动化和集成
- 商业版支持基于角色的访问控制（社区版不包含）
- 内置公共演示环境，定期重置供测试使用
- 应用内数据分析功能（可选择退出），用于产品优化
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Simplifies complex container orchestration through an intuitive GUI
- Lightweight and easy to deploy on any cluster with minimal overhead
- Unified management interface for multiple container platforms (Docker, Kubernetes, ACI)

## Features:

- Manage containers, images, volumes, networks, and services via web UI
- Support for Docker, Docker Swarm, Kubernetes, and Azure Container Instances (ACI)
- Runs as a single container for Linux or Windows
- RESTful API for automation and integration
- Role-based access control available in Business Edition (not in CE)
- Built-in public demo with regular reset for testing
- In-app analytics (opt-out available) for product improvement
